__TOC__

Last months team report was delayed to include all our release parties.
* Stellenbosch Release Party pics on blogs <nowiki>[[http://jonathancarter.co.za/2010/05/03/ubuntu-za-cape-town-lucid-release-party/ |Jonathan]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://blog.smartcube.co.za/2010/05/02/release-party-awesomeness/ |drubin]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://my-ubuntu-day.blogspot.com/2010/03/third-stellenbosch-ubuntu-hour.html | maia]]</nowiki>
* We had 3 other release parties around South Africa: Pretoria, Free State and Gauteng
* Launch of revamped http://ubuntu-za.org  website
* Deprecated http://planet.ubuntu-za.org in favor of [http://ubuntu-za.org/planet planet] 
* Handed out Ubuntu cd's at the SULUG (Stellenbosch University Linux User Group)'s beer evening
* Morgan Collette <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-za/2010-May/006079.html stepped down]]</nowiki> as Loco Contact - David Rubin will continue to take on loco-contact responsibility.
